extendedInfo.description: NYC Health Ratings for android allows you to search detailed inspections results for all 24,000 plus restaurants reviewed in New York City.  The data is published weekly by the city of New York Department of Health and Mental Hygiene.  Our app allows you to search by restaurant name or cuisine type, filtering by grade and location.  Location can either be specified by address, zipcode or current location based on either gps or network location.  This app is now integrated with FourSquare.  You can easily check in and share restaurant ratings as a tip or a shout when checking in!  So use it before eating and spread the word to your friends.  If you have any suggestions or notice any bugs please email me and Ill fix it.

reviews.title: Good start
reviews.comment: Until we get an official app from the city, this API tool will do. The search feature needs refinement.
reviews.author: Brendan A. MacWade

reviews.title: UI is bad, but it does work
reviews.comment: It works, but needs serious improvement: -Needs \"use current location\" to actually do something. It\'s a checkbox that leaves my head scratching. I would expect it to show nearby restaurants, so I can see which have what ratings. -Tapping on the little arrow to expand the rating is seriously annoying, needs to be the whole line. There\'s no other reason to tap on the rating apart from seeing detail, why not make the whole line do the expansion when you tap? -searching for a known restaurant gives poor results. Do I need to uncheck \"use current location\" or something? Very unintuitive.
reviews.author: John Pavlakis

reviews.title: Horrible.
reviews.comment: Sucks!!!!!!!
reviews.author: William Long

reviews.title: Nice Little App
reviews.comment: Works perfectly. Very effective at rooting out bad unsanitary restaurants
reviews.author: Adam Lipp

reviews.title: Great app!!
reviews.comment: It has taken me long enough, but I am finally writing a review. Very good concept and application! Keep up the good work!
reviews.author: William Katz

reviews.title: Great but needs more...
reviews.comment: Displays the grade but not the infractions on my DroidX
reviews.author: Jared Kipnis

reviews.title: Wonderful App
reviews.comment: This so handy and it works perfectly!
reviews.author: Roderick Sayers

reviews.title: Must have
reviews.comment: I am adamant about checking grades of restaurants prior to eating food from them. More convenient than going to NYC\'s site
reviews.author: NikXis Young

reviews.title: JP
reviews.comment: This app open my eyes it show me even a restaurant at have a A on it the doses not show details in the restaurant.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Thank you i know where to eat
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: No more eating with the rats (now i missed the picture in the icon)! I love how you can search by location and see the letter grade in the list.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: I needed an app like this and this works great. It doesn\'t crash on my HTC EVO 4g LTE. The only thing I wish I could change is the icon of the app and the title name. The photo doesn\'t match the cartoon icons of every other app out there
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good info
reviews.comment: This is important info to have on your phone. I\'ll never eat at a B  restaurant again. App works great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Holy Crap!
reviews.comment: Well this settles it, not only is the food full of salt and sugars its full of vermin too. Well at least its protein.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Icon
reviews.comment: The app icon of a rat is nasty. Drop it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Never eat out without it
reviews.comment: Trust your judgement but use this app as well.  Search works very well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 5 Stars
reviews.comment: Much improved since last time I tried this app I can now read the font. Now it is worthy of 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very helpful app
reviews.comment: Use this before going into any restaurant in the city.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs a little improvement
reviews.comment: The map is a little inaccurate and the list could be a little easier to sort through. Ratings are somewhat up to date and accurate. Not bad. Needs work!!!
reviews.author: A Google User
